    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>

          <title>
            <string language="nl">Horrendous Soup</string>
          </title>
          <language>nl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Make the worst soup ever known to mankind with your awesome metric conversion skills! You need to have JavaScript enabled in your browser.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conversions</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">capacity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">distance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">mass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travel well</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">universal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Travelwell</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">eQNet</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>4</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bilden Sie die falschste Suppe überhaupt bekannt Menschheit 
mit Ihren ehrfürchtigen metrischen Konvertierung Fähigkeiten! Sie 
müssen das Javascript haben, das in Ihrer Datenbanksuchroutine 
aktiviert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Faites connaître le potage le plus gâté jamais à 
l'humanité avec vos qualifications métriques impressionnantes de 
conversion ! Vous devez avoir le Javascript permis dans votre 
navigateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Faça a sopa a mais má sabida sempre à humanidade com suas 
habilidades métricas awesome da conversão! Você necessita ter o 
Javascript permitido em seu browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Faccia conoscere la minestra più difettosa mai all'umanità 
con le vostre abilità metriche impressionanti di conversione! Dovete 
avere Javascript permesso in vostro browser.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γνωστοποιήστε τη χειρότερη σούπα πάντα στην ανθρωπότητα με τις 
τρομερές μετρικές δεξιότητες μετατροπής σας! Πρέπει να 
επιτρέψετε JavaScript στον ξεφυλλιστή σας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¡Haga la sopa peor sabida siempre a la humanidad con sus 
habilidades métricas impresionantes de la conversión! Usted necesita
tener Javascript permitido en su browser.</string>
          </description>
